Description.SourceString: +7.5% Weapon Damage. Changes damage to Lightning, which is more effective vs Fire but less effective vs Ice enemies. Causes affliction for 6 seconds, dealing damage every second. Cannot be applied more than once every 7 seconds per target.
Description.LocalizedString: +7.5% Weapon Damage. Changes damage to Lightning, which is more effective vs Fire but less effective vs Ice enemies. Causes affliction for 6 seconds, dealing damage every second. Cannot be applied more than once every 7 seconds per target.
